mapper.select: select sc.id as schedule_id, gr.id as group_id, gr.number as number, sp.name as speciality_name, sp.id as speciality_id, sp.name as specility_name, sp.code as code, le.id as lecture_id, di.id as id, di.name as name, pr.id as professor_id, pr.name as professor_name, pr.second_name as professor_second_name, pr.gender as professor_gender, pr.name as professor_phone, ch.id as chair_id, ch.name as chair_name, ch.email as chair_email, ch.phone as chair_phone, fa.id as faculty_id, fa.name as faculty_name, fa.email as faculty_email, fa.phone as faculty_phone, u.id as university_id, u.name as university_name, ad.id as address_id, ad.street as street, ad.house as house, ci.id as citi_id, ci.city as city, c.id as country_id, c.country as country from Schedules sc inner join Groups gr on sc.Groups_id=gr.id inner join Specialties sp on gr.Specialties_id=sp.id inner join Lectures le on sc.Lectures_id=le.id inner join Professors pr on le.Professors_id=pr.id inner join Disciplines di on le.Disciplines_id=di.id inner join Chairs ch on pr.Chairs_id=ch.id inner join Faculties fa on ch.Faculties_id=fa.id inner join Universities u on fa.Universities_id=u.id inner join Addresses ad on u.Addresses_id=ad.id inner join Cities ci on ad.Cities_id=ci.id inner join Countries c on ci.Countries_id=c.id WHERE sc.id = #{id}
